article_title: Whistleblowers Expose Massachusetts ACA Exchange, DOJ Issues Subpoenas

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: The AP has reported that the U.S. Attorney's office has issued subpoenas to the Massachusetts Health Connector, the state’s ACA insurance exchange. So what really happened in the state that some say “inspired” the ACA? And does the future of the original full blown state-based exchange look bleak as federal taxpayer money dries up?
